      • validateAsync

        public Future<Void> validateAsync(Object in)
        Description copied from interface: Schema
        Validate the json performing an asynchronous validation. Returns a failed future with ValidationException if json doesn't match the schema.

        Note: If the schema is synchronous, this method will call internally this#validateSync(Object)

        Specified by:
        validateAsync in interface Schema
        Returns:
